articles.description: Four-time NFL MVP Aaron Rodgers is to leave the New York Jets.

articles.description: Semi-automated offside technology will be used in English domestic football for the first time during the fifth round of the FA Cup.

articles.description: Arsenal striker Kai Havertz is set to miss the rest of the season with a hamstring injury and may need surgery.

articles.description: England "backed guys off a little" because of injuries during their tour of India, says coach Brendon McCullum amid criticism of the team's preparation.
articles.title: England in India: Brendon McCullum says injuries impacted tourists training time amid criticism

articles.description: Porto and Roma, two of the pre-season favourites to win the Europa League, draw the first leg of their knockout-phase play-off.

articles.description: Lando Norris says he needs to get his "elbows out" but also be "smart" in his battles with rival Max Verstappen on track this year.
articles.title: McLaren 2025 car: Lando Norris says he needs to be smart to beat Max Verstappen

articles.description: Chelsea boss Sonia Bompastor says Sam Kerr's apology "is enough" and that the club will not be taking any further action following the player's court case.
articles.title: Sam Kerr: Chelsea manager Sonia Bompastor says striker's apology 'enough'

articles.description: Jakob Ingebrigtsen smashes the indoor world records for the mile and 1,500m in a race at the World Athletics Indoor Tour Gold meeting in France.
articles.title: Norway's Jakob Ingebrigtsen breaks two indoor world records at France athletics meeting
